T: That teacher is always scolding his students.

S: Who are you waiting for? I'm not waiting for anyone.
T: Who are you waiting for? I'm not waiting for anyone.

S: My friend from the U.S. will be arriving at Kyoto Station at 4:00 p.m. on Saturday.
T: An American friend is arriving at Kyoto Station at 4 p.m. next Saturday.

S: My brother is taking a bath. Please call me again in half an hour.
T: My brother is having a bath now. Please call again in half an hour.

S: What club are you in? I'm in the choir club (the Glee Club).
T: What club do you belong to? I belong to the Glee Club.

S: The two of us love each other.
T: The two love each other.

S: What were you doing this time yesterday? I was taking a walk along the river bank.
T: What were you doing about this time yesterday? I was walking along the bank of the river.

S: What will you be doing tomorrow around 7:00 a.m.? I will probably be watching TV with the house.
T: What will you be doing at about seven tomorrow evening? Probably I will be watching TV with my family.

S: Have you written a letter yet? Yes, I have.
T: Have you written the letter yet? Yes, I have already written it.

S: Where did you go? I just went to the station.
T: Where have you been? I have just been to the station.

S: Is your mother there? No, she has gone shopping.
T: Is your mother at home? No. She has gone shopping.

S: Have you had lunch yet? Yes, about half an hour ago.
T: Have you finished lunch yet? Yes, I finished about half an hour ago.

S: Have you ever been abroad before? No, never.
T: Have you ever been abroad? No, I have never been abroad.

S: I have lived in this town since I was born.
T: I have lived in this town since I was born.

S: What have you been doing?
T: What have you been doing all this time?

S: It's been five years since we last met.
T: How long is it since I saw you last? It's about five years.

S: I went to Matsue this past Sunday. I'd been there before with my aunt.
T: I went to Matsue last Sunday. I had been there with my aunt before.

S: My friend found my lost season ticket.
T: A friend of mine found the season ticket I had lost.

S: Two hours before my father left, I was studying.
T: I had been studying for two hours when my father came back.

S: By the time I met her again, she was already married.
T: She had already got married when I met her again.

S: Do you know the saying, 'Like a shadow of an arrow'?
T: Do you know the proverb "Time flies like an arrow"?

S: If it rains tomorrow, an athletic meeting will be postponed to the 25th.
T: If it rains tomorrow, the athletic meeting will be put off till the 25th of this month.

S: His illness is serious, and we don't know when he will recover.
T: He is seriously ill. I don't know when he will get well again.

S: When I entered his room, he was dozing off at his desk.
T: When I went into his room, I found him having a nap at the desk.

S: I went to Horyuji Temple the other day, but I had never been there before.
T: I went to Horyu-ji Temple the other day. I had never visited the temple before.

S: I used to stay up late a lot when I was a student.
T: I would often stay up late at night when I was a student.

S: May I use this tape recorder? No, you may not.
T: May I use this tape recorder? No, you may not.

S: You should have told your teacher the truth.
T: You should have told the truth to the teacher.

S: You must be tired. Please sit down in this chair.
T: You must be tired. Please sit down on this chair.

S: We have to hurry so that we don't miss the bus.
T: Hurry so that you may not miss the bus.

S: You don't have to speak so loudly.
T: You don't have to talk so loudly.

S: I'd like to meet you at the coffee shop.
T: I'd like to meet you at the coffee shop.

S: What languages are spoken in Switzerland?
T: What language is spoken in Switzerland?

S: I sell vegetables in that store.
T: They sell vegetables at that store.

S: I was asked by a friend to give this letter to the woman.
T: I was asked by a friend of mine to hand this letter to the woman.

S: I asked my teacher to revise my essay.
T: I had my composition corrected by the teacher.
